content: baby polar bear crochet pattern this pattern is not for sale instead i am asking that you pay it forward you may have the pattern for free but you have to promise to do something kind for someone else in return you may share this pattern with others as long as they are willing to participate in the pay it forward as well please leave this introduction intact when sharing the pattern with others i would love to keep a running list of the service that has been rendered to others as part of the pay it forward if you would like your deed added to the list email me at eebrs at yahoo dot com or add it to the comments section on my blog make sure you put polar bear pay it forward or something similar in the subject line on your email your service not your name will be added to a
